body.ab: <lb n="c56-0073__main__1"/><milestone spanTo="#c56-0073.05" unit="tei:head"/>Chap. 9th<lb n="c56-0073__main__2"/> On my return I found the following letter <lb n="c56-0073__main__3"/> from my father. <lb n="c56-0073__main__4"/> To V.–Frankenstein <lb n="c56-0073__main__5"/> Geneva – June 2nd– 17— <lb n="c56-0073__main__6"/> My dear Victor<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0073__main__7"/> You have probably waited impati<lb n="c56-0073__main__8"/>ently<del loc="c56-0073__main__d1e13841__Start"/>the<del loc="c56-0073__main__d1e13841__End"/> for <del loc="c56-0073__main__d1e13846__Start"/>the<del loc="c56-0073__main__d1e13846__End"/>a letter <del loc="c56-0073__main__d1e13853__Start"/>which was<del loc="c56-0073__main__d1e13853__End"/> to fix <lb n="c56-0073__main__9"/><lb n="c56-0073__left_margin__1"/>the date of your return and I was at first tempted <lb n="c56-0073__main__10"/> to write a few lines <del loc="c56-0073__main__d1e13867__Start"/>only<del loc="c56-0073__main__d1e13867__End"/><del loc="c56-0073__main__d1e13870__Start"/>to<del loc="c56-0073__main__d1e13870__End"/><del loc="c56-0073__main__d1e13873__Start"/>fix<del loc="c56-0073__main__d1e13873__End"/><del loc="c56-0073__main__d1e13877__Start"/>that<del loc="c56-0073__main__d1e13877__End"/>merely mentioning the day<lb n="c56-0073__main__11"/><del loc="c56-0073__main__d1e13883__Start"/>date<del loc="c56-0073__main__d1e13883__End"/><lb n="c56-0073__left_margin__1"/> on which <lb n="c56-0073__left_margin__2"/> I should <lb n="c56-0073__left_margin__3"/> expect you – but that would be <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>a<del loc="c56-0073__main__d1e13907__Start"/>very<del loc="c56-0073__main__d1e13907__End"/> cruel <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>kindness<lb n="c56-0073__main__12"/> and I dare not do it. What would <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>be your <lb n="c56-0073__main__13"/> surprise <del loc="c56-0073__main__d1e13936__Start"/>be<del loc="c56-0073__main__d1e13936__End"/>, my son<del loc="c56-0073__main__d1e13939__Start"/>e<del loc="c56-0073__main__d1e13939__End"/>, when your ex<lb n="c56-0073__main__14"/>pected a happy and gay welcome to <del loc="c56-0073__main__d1e13949__Start"/>heho<del loc="c56-0073__main__d1e13949__End"/><lb n="c56-0073__main__15"/> beh<mdel>o</mdel>eld on the contrary tears and wretched<lb n="c56-0073__main__16"/>ness. And how, Victor, can I relate our <lb n="c56-0073__main__17"/> misfortune<mdel>;</mdel>? absence cannot have rendered <lb n="c56-0073__main__18"/> you callous to our joys and griefs and how <lb n="c56-0073__main__19"/> can I inflict pain on an absent child.? <lb n="c56-0073__main__20"/> I wish to prepare you for the woeful <lb n="c56-0073__main__21"/> news but I know it is impossible; even <lb n="c56-0073__main__22"/> now your eye skims over the page to <lb n="c56-0073__main__23"/> seek the words which are to convey to <lb n="c56-0073__main__24"/> you the horrible tidings.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0073__main__25"/> William is dead! That sweet child <lb n="c56-0073__main__26"/> whose smiles delighted & warmed me <lb n="c56-0073__main__27"/> who was so gentle yet so gay, Victor, he <lb n="c56-0073__main__28"/> is Murdered!<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0073__main__29"/> I will not attempt to <del loc="c56-0073__main__d1e14013__Start"/>o<del loc="c56-0073__main__d1e14013__End"/> console you <lb n="c56-0073__main__30"/> but will simply relate the circumstances <lb n="c56-0073__main__31"/> of the transaction.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0074__main__1"/> Last thurday (May <del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14028__Start"/>26<del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14028__End"/> 28th) I; <del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14036__Start"/>yourmy<del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14036__End"/><del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14042__Start"/>cousin<del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14042__End"/><lb n="c56-0074__main__2"/> my niece and your two brothers went to <lb n="c56-0074__main__3"/> walk in Plainpalais. The evening was <lb n="c56-0074__main__4"/> warm and serene, and we prolonged our <lb n="c56-0074__main__5"/> walk <del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14054__Start"/>fat<del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14054__End"/> farther than usual. It was <lb n="c56-0074__main__6"/><del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14059__Start"/>ale<del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14059__End"/> already dusk before we thought of <lb n="c56-0074__main__7"/> returning <del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14067__Start"/>When<del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14067__End"/>and then we <del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14076__Start"/>found<del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14076__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>discovered that Ernest <lb n="c56-0074__main__8"/> and William who had gone on before, <lb n="c56-0074__main__9"/> were not to be found. We accordingly <lb n="c56-0074__main__10"/> rested on a seat untill they should <lb n="c56-0074__main__11"/> return. Presently Ernest came <del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14096__Start"/>up<del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14096__End"/>&<lb n="c56-0074__main__12"/> enquired for his brother he said that <lb n="c56-0074__main__13"/> he had been playing with <del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14103__Start"/>them<del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14103__End"/> him <lb n="c56-0074__main__14"/> and that William had run away to <lb n="c56-0074__main__15"/> hide himself and that he had <del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14113__Start"/>wai<del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14113__End"/>vainly<lb n="c56-0074__main__16"/> sought <del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14122__Start"/>fo<del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14122__End"/> for him & afterwards wai <lb n="c56-0074__main__17"/> ted a long time but that he did <lb n="c56-0074__main__18"/> not return.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0074__main__19"/> This rather alarmed us and we <del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14134__Start"/>sought<del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14134__End"/><lb n="c56-0074__main__20"/> continued to search for himuntill night fell<del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14143__Start"/>l<del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14143__End"/>; <lb n="c56-0074__main__21"/><lb n="c56-0074__left_margin__1"/>when Elizabeth conjectured that he might have <lb n="c56-0074__main__22"/> returned to the house: <del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14156__Start"/>but<del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14156__End"/> he was <lb n="c56-0074__main__23"/> not there – We returned again with torches <lb n="c56-0074__main__24"/> for I could not rest when I thought my <lb n="c56-0074__main__25"/> sweet child had lost himself, and <lb n="c56-0074__main__26"/> was exposed to all the damps & dews <lb n="c56-0074__main__27"/> of night; Elizabeth also suffered extreme <lb n="c56-0074__main__28"/> anguish. <del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14172__Start"/>We found him<del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14172__End"/><mdel>a</mdel>About <del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14187__Start"/>four<del loc="c56-0074__main__d1e14187__End"/><lb n="c56-0074__left_margin__1"/>seven<lb n="c56-0074__main__29"/> in the morning I discovered my lovely <lb n="c56-0074__main__30"/> boy whom the night before I had seen<lb n="c56-0075__main__1"/> blooming & active in health stretch <lb n="c56-0075__main__2"/> ed on the grass livid and motionless– <lb n="c56-0075__main__3"/> the print of the murderers finger was <lb n="c56-0075__main__4"/> on his neck.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0075__main__5"/> He was conveyed home and the <lb n="c56-0075__main__6"/><del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14221__Start"/>extreme<del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14221__End"/><del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14224__Start"/>wh<del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14224__End"/><del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14229__Start"/>misery<del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14229__End"/>anguish<del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14236__Start"/>agony<del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14236__End"/> that was <lb n="c56-0075__main__7"/> visible in my countenance revealed <lb n="c56-0075__main__8"/> the secret to Elizabeth. She was extreme<lb n="c56-0075__main__9"/>ly<lb n="c56-0075__left_margin__1"/>very earnest to see the corpse. <del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14260__Start"/>which<del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14260__End"/>^<mdel>I</mdel>for a <lb n="c56-0075__main__10"/> long time<del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14278__Start"/>refused<del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14278__End"/><lb n="c56-0075__left_margin__1"/>At first I attempted to prevent her but <del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14290__Start"/><del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14290__End"/> she persisted, <lb n="c56-0075__main__11"/> and entering the room where it lay <lb n="c56-0075__main__12"/><del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14297__Start"/>quickly<del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14297__End"/> hastily examined the neck of <lb n="c56-0075__main__13"/> the victim and clasping her <del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14302__Start"/>hads<del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14302__End"/><lb n="c56-0075__main__14"/> hands exclaimed— <del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14307__Start"/>Go<del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14307__End"/> Oh God! I have <lb n="c56-0075__main__15"/> murdered <del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14313__Start"/>this sweet<del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14313__End"/><del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14316__Start"/>babe<del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14316__End"/><del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14318__Start"/>.<del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14318__End"/> my darling <lb n="c56-0075__main__16"/> infant.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0075__main__17"/> She fainted and was retored with <lb n="c56-0075__main__18"/> extreme difficulty; <del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14330__Start"/>and<del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14330__End"/> when she again <lb n="c56-0075__main__19"/> lived it was only to weep and sigh– <lb n="c56-0075__main__20"/> She told me that that same evening <lb n="c56-0075__main__21"/> William had teazed her to let him <lb n="c56-0075__main__22"/><del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14341__Start"/>we<del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14341__End"/><del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14344__Start"/>we<del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14344__End"/> wear a very valuable miniature <lb n="c56-0075__main__23"/> she possessed of your Mother. This <lb n="c56-0075__main__24"/> picture is gone and was doubtless <lb n="c56-0075__main__25"/> the temptation which urged the mur<lb n="c56-0075__main__26"/>derer to the deed. We have no trace <lb n="c56-0075__main__27"/><del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14361__Start"/>of<del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14361__End"/><del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14364__Start"/>Come my dear Victor<del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14364__End"/><del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14367__Start"/>him<del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14367__End"/> at <lb n="c56-0075__main__28"/> present of him, <del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14375__Start"/>but<del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14375__End"/>altho our exertions <del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14384__Start"/>are<del loc="c56-0075__main__d1e14384__End"/>to discover him<lb n="c56-0075__main__29"/> are unremitted; but they will not restore <lb n="c56-0075__main__30"/> my beloved William.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0075__main__31"/> Come, dearest Victor, you alone can<lb n="c56-0076__main__1"/> console Elizabeth, <del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14409__Start"/>who<del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14409__End"/>She weeps <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>continually& accuses herself <lb n="c56-0076__main__2"/><del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14427__Start"/>of all how u<del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14427__End"/><del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14430__Start"/>so<del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14430__End"/> unjustly <metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c56-0076.01">^</metamark><del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14440__Start"/>and<del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14440__End"/> yet her words <lb n="c56-0076__main__3"/><del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14445__Start"/>of th<del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14445__End"/> as the cause of his death—<lb n="c56-0076__main__4"/> pierce my heart. We are all unhappy <lb n="c56-0076__main__5"/> but <del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14453__Start"/>that<del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14453__End"/> will not that be an additio<lb n="c56-0076__main__6"/>nal motive <mdel>to</mdel>for you, my <del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14472__Start"/>co<del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14472__End"/> son, to <del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14477__Start"/>come<del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14477__End"/>return<lb n="c56-0076__main__7"/> and be our comforter. Your dear Mother! <lb n="c56-0076__main__8"/> Alas, Victor! I now say Thank God she did <lb n="c56-0076__main__9"/> not live to witness <del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14491__Start"/>this grief<del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14491__End"/><del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14493__Start"/>–<del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14493__End"/><mdel>T</mdel>the cruel <lb n="c56-0076__main__10"/> miserable death of her youngest darling.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0076__main__11"/> Come, Victor; not brooding <del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14512__Start"/>w<del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14512__End"/> thoughts <lb n="c56-0076__main__12"/> of vengeance against the assassin but <lb n="c56-0076__main__13"/> with feelings of peace and gentleness <lb n="c56-0076__main__14"/> that will heal instead of festering the <lb n="c56-0076__main__15"/><del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14523__Start"/>woul<del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14523__End"/> wound<del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14526__Start"/>s<del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14526__End"/> of our <del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14529__Start"/>soul<del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14529__End"/> minds. Enter <lb n="c56-0076__main__16"/> the house of mourning, my son & friend <lb n="c56-0076__main__17"/> but with kindness and affection <lb n="c56-0076__main__18"/> for those who love you & not with <lb n="c56-0076__main__19"/> hat<mdel>e</mdel>red for your enemies. <lb n="c56-0076__main__20"/> Your affectionate & afflicted father <lb n="c56-0076__main__21"/> Alphonse Frankenstein <lb n="c56-0076__main__22"/><del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14556__Start"/>Al<del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14556__End"/><lb n="c56-0076__main__23"/><metamark function="separate">_______________</metamark><milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0076__main__24"/> Clerval who had watched my countenance <lb n="c56-0076__main__25"/> as I read this letter was surprised in observ- <lb n="c56-0076__main__26"/> ing the despair that succeeded to the joy <lb n="c56-0076__main__27"/> I expressed on receiving news from my friends. <lb n="c56-0076__main__28"/> I threw the letter on the table and covered <lb n="c56-0076__main__29"/> my face with my hands.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0076__main__30"/> "My dear Frankenstien," exclaimed <lb n="c56-0076__main__31"/><del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14586__Start"/>hen<del loc="c56-0076__main__d1e14586__End"/> Henry when he saw me weep with<lb n="c56-0077__main__1"/> bitterness "are you always to be unhappy? <lb n="c56-0077__main__2"/> "my dear friend, what has happened?"<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0077__main__3"/> I motioned to him to <del loc="c56-0077__main__d1e14605__Start"/>read<del loc="c56-0077__main__d1e14605__End"/>take up the letter <lb n="c56-0077__main__4"/> while I walked up & down the room <lb n="c56-0077__main__5"/> in the most extreme agitation. Clerval <lb n="c56-0077__main__6"/> read the letter – <del loc="c56-0077__main__d1e14623__Start"/>and<del loc="c56-0077__main__d1e14623__End"/> tears also <del loc="c56-0077__main__d1e14627__Start"/>gush<del loc="c56-0077__main__d1e14627__End"/><lb n="c56-0077__main__7"/> gushed <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>also from <del loc="c56-0077__main__d1e14644__Start"/>his<del loc="c56-0077__main__d1e14644__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>the eyes <metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c56-0077.02">X</metamark><lb n="c56-0077__left_margin__1"/><metamark function="displacement">X</metamark>of Clerval <lb n="c56-0077__left_margin__2"/> as he read the <lb n="c56-0077__left_margin__3"/> account of my <lb n="c56-0077__left_margin__4"/> misfortune –"I can offer you <lb n="c56-0077__main__8"/> "no consolation, my friend," said he <del loc="c56-0077__main__d1e14677__Start"/>my<del loc="c56-0077__main__d1e14677__End"/><lb n="c56-0077__main__9"/> "your <del loc="c56-0077__main__d1e14684__Start"/>misfortune<del loc="c56-0077__main__d1e14684__End"/>disaster is irreperable.<del loc="c56-0077__main__d1e14691__Start"/>"<del loc="c56-0077__main__d1e14691__End"/> What <lb n="c56-0077__main__10"/> "do you intend to do"?<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0077__main__11"/> "To go instantly to Geneva<del loc="c56-0077__main__d1e14701__Start"/>"<del loc="c56-0077__main__d1e14701__End"/> come <lb n="c56-0077__main__12"/> with me, Clerval, to order the horses"<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0077__main__13"/> During our walk <del loc="c56-0077__main__d1e14710__Start"/>C<del loc="c56-0077__main__d1e14710__End"/> Henryendeav<lb n="c56-0077__main__14"/>oured to raise my spirits– He did not <lb n="c56-0077__main__15"/> do this by the common topics of <del loc="c56-0077__main__d1e14722__Start"/>conversatio<del loc="c56-0077__main__d1e14722__End"/><lb n="c56-0077__main__16"/> consolation but<del loc="c56-0077__main__d1e14728__Start"/>t<del loc="c56-0077__main__d1e14728__End"/> by shew<mdel>e</mdel>ing the truest <lb n="c56-0077__main__17"/> sympathy. "Poor William" said "that dear <lb n="c56-0077__main__18"/> "child he now sleeps with his angel <lb n="c56-0077__main__19"/> "mother. His friends mourn and weep but <lb n="c56-0077__main__20"/> "he is at rest he does not now feel the <lb n="c56-0077__main__21"/> "murderers grasp – a <del loc="c56-0077__main__d1e14751__Start"/>green<del loc="c56-0077__main__d1e14751__End"/> sod covers his <lb n="c56-0077__main__22"/> "gentle form and he knows no pain–He <lb n="c56-0077__main__23"/> "can no longer be a subject for pity his <lb n="c56-0077__main__24"/> "survivors are the greatest sufferers and <lb n="c56-0077__main__25"/> "for them time is the<del loc="c56-0077__main__d1e14763__Start"/>ir<del loc="c56-0077__main__d1e14763__End"/> only consolation. <lb n="c56-0077__main__26"/> "Those maxims of the stoics that death <lb n="c56-0077__main__27"/> "was no evil and that the mind of man <lb n="c56-0077__main__28"/> "ought to be superior to <del loc="c56-0077__main__d1e14775__Start"/>that<del loc="c56-0077__main__d1e14775__End"/> despair <lb n="c56-0077__main__29"/> "on the eternal absence of a beloved <lb n="c56-0077__main__30"/> "object ought not to be urged – even <lb n="c56-0077__main__31"/> "Cato wept over the dead body of his <lb n="c56-0077__main__32"/> "brother."<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0078__main__1"/> Clerval spoke this as we huried <lb n="c56-0078__main__2"/><del loc="c56-0078__main__d1e14796__Start"/>thou<del loc="c56-0078__main__d1e14796__End"/> through the streets the words <lb n="c56-0078__main__3"/> impressed themselves on my <del loc="c56-0078__main__d1e14801__Start"/>memor<del loc="c56-0078__main__d1e14801__End"/><lb n="c56-0078__main__4"/> mind and I remembered them afterwads <lb n="c56-0078__main__5"/> in solitude. <del loc="c56-0078__main__d1e14809__Start"/>As soon<del loc="c56-0078__main__d1e14809__End"/> But now, as soon <lb n="c56-0078__main__6"/> as the horses arrived I hurried into <lb n="c56-0078__main__7"/> a Cabriolet and <del loc="c56-0078__main__d1e14816__Start"/>left Ingo<del loc="c56-0078__main__d1e14816__End"/> bad fare <lb n="c56-0078__main__8"/> well to my friend.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c56-0078__main__9"/> My journey was very melancholy. <lb n="c56-0078__main__10"/> At first I wished to hurry on for I longed <lb n="c56-0078__main__11"/> to console & sympathize withmy loved and <lb n="c56-0078__main__12"/> sorrowing friends but when I drew <lb n="c56-0078__main__13"/> near my <del loc="c56-0078__main__d1e14838__Start"/>t<del loc="c56-0078__main__d1e14838__End"/> native town I sla<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>ckened <lb n="c56-0078__main__14"/> my <del loc="c56-0078__main__d1e14855__Start"/>pace<del loc="c56-0078__main__d1e14855__End"/>progress. <del
